description:
A trip to a hot springs should be relaxing for all involved, until a phone call that the springs have been wired with explosives by a terrorist who wants to play a game.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bijin OL Rokunin Tabi Hiyu Daibakuha
Six Babes Bathing in a Killer Hot Spring
美人OL6人旅 秘湯大爆破
